hello everone,

and i dont no where i say to the game "make smoke" it's in unity or blender with annimation?

sorry for my terible inglish but i'm french and it's not my 1st language ^^'

Nazari, the guy who made HotRockets, or at least whover made the fireworks mod might have an answer.

By the way I (think) we have a German subforum for German speakers as well.

sorry for my terible inglish but i'm french and it's not my 1st language ^^'

Oh. You're French. Me too

Tu devrais regarder le mod Kerbal Fireworks qui ajoute des feux d'artifices mais qui font trÃƒÂ¨s bien l'affaire. Peut-ÃƒÂªtre que des personnes pourront te donner une aide plus approfondie, soit ici soit sur la section francophone

je vais reguarder je revient au cas ou.

Nazari, the guy who made HotRockets, or at least whover made the fireworks mod might have an answer.

By the way I (think) we have a German subforum for German speakers as well.

I did play around with this idea. You should be able to edit the image file in this mod for new colors if needed:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79181-Aerobatic-Smoke

edit: can't believe it has been more than a year since I posted it. Update Smokescreen to the newest version after installing.
